alert.note: Alert for Greer; Harmon; Jackson; Kiowa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 9:17PM CDT until June 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Western Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 916 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Vinson, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Mangum, Granite, Blair, Olustee, Lone Wolf, Martha, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Vinson, Duke, Warren, Brinkman, Hester, and Altus-Lugert Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
